title: (EUW + NA) FOUND A WORKAROUND TO GET CART TO LOAD (no gateway issue)

embed.description: The Riot Games merch store is here! Discover merch crafted to capture the spirit of League in every stitch and brushstroke, so you can carry a piece of your game wherever you go.

body:
(EUW) FOUND A WORKAROUND TO CART GATEWAY >>>>>>>>>>

On euw, got to cart screen by using a "different" page 

<< https://euw.merch.riotgames.com/en/checkout/cart >> 

so without the /index

got me to cart then after some loading got to payment and all was fine, hope this helps.

EDIT: NA link since apparently it works too
 << https://na.merch.riotgames.com/en/checkout/cart  >>

EDIT 2: store page for it for (euw) 
<<  https://euw.merch.riotgames.com/en/other/board-games/mechs-v-s-minions.html >>

replies.body:
I was able to get it to work using the following (NA). For what it's worth - mostly just dealing with an overwhelmed system so nothing is likely to be consistent...

-Firefox browser
-http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/featured/mechs-vs-minions => Purchase now (at bottom)
-Available Now
-Click Wave 1 image of the game
-Add to cart
-New tab and load https://na.merch.riotgames.com/en/checkout/onepage
-Sign in with LoL account
-New tab and load https://na.merch.riotgames.com/en/checkout/onepage again

First time it had an issue with processing my address (I wasn't logged in with my LoL account), second time it worked correctly. Been trying it a million different ways since it went up. Good luck!

Edit: I don't know how things work.
YOU ARE A LIFESAVER I'M GOING TO WORSHIP YOU FOR EONS NOW{{champion:103}}
I'd advise against loggjng in with league account. Caused me to crash several times. Used the guest login and went right through
hrmm... i had exactly the opposite problem. was not able to get to cart until after i logged in with my league name. then no problems.
my sku was 1241-00-00, was your same or is that actually the # of our box?
The sku is the number for the product.  It is the number below the barcode on the packaging, and it is used for inventory management.

> [{quoted}](name=imgnthat,realm=NA,application-id=AMxvhsRt,discussion-id=Mbelsw69,comment-id=00060000,timestamp=2016-10-13T19:27:18.718+0000)
>
> my sku was 1241-00-00, was your same or is that actually the # of our box?

Same. That is just the item number for warehouse purposes. You probably won't know your number till you get it.

used this link to bypass https://na.merch.riotgames.com/en/ulticheckout/checkout/index/

and it worked :D

> [{quoted}](name=Krimson62,realm=NA,application-id=AMxvhsRt,discussion-id=Mbelsw69,comment-id=000e,timestamp=2016-10-13T19:30:53.906+0000)
>
> used this link to bypass https://na.merch.riotgames.com/en/ulticheckout/checkout/index/
> 
> and it worked :D

this worked for me! Thank you so much!
I took off a backslash at the end of the link and it worked for me. Order being processed now! Good luck!

GOT IT!  

Hey, just try it with and without index and with and without slash.  You'll eventually get through!

EDIT:  Here are your four options.  Try these.  The first one got me through.

https://na.merch.riotgames.com/en/checkout/cart/index

https://na.merch.riotgames.com/en/checkout/cart/index/

https://na.merch.riotgames.com/en/checkout/cart 

https://na.merch.riotgames.com/en/checkout/cart/
finally worked.... i almost gave up hope.
I got through using the first link, in firefox.  Chrome and Safari are still timing out.
Works on NA too
I tried it on NA and didn't get anything

not working for me either. (NA) maybe everyone read this post and clogged that page as well.

edit: OK! I had been putting in " https://na.merch.riotgames.com/en/checkout/cart/ " and after reviewing this thread i changed it to " https://na.merch.riotgames.com/en/checkout/cart " (no end slash) and it worked first try!
Yup, that final slash got me too.

> [{quoted}](name=NeSigns,realm=NA,application-id=AMxvhsRt,discussion-id=Mbelsw69,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2016-10-13T18:57:34.373+0000)
>
> I tried it on NA and didn't get anything

make sure you use the na link, just remove /index
Got it finally.  Did a different URL, but got it none-the-less.

I did :/

Still didn't work
Finally got it. Dang that was a pain. Inb4 it never actually sells out XD
Got a copy order and confirmation email. Keep trying guys and gals.
Good Lord... This is as bad as trying to buy World's Tickets for the Finals...
Totally worked man! After 2 hours of stress I finally was able to process the order, and now thanks to you I'm a owner of MvM. Yeeeeaaaaaahhh :)

> Totally worked man! After 2 hours of stress I finally was able to process the order, and now thanks to you I'm a owner of MvM. Yeeeeaaaaaahhh :)

Are you sure you get shipment#1 ? since Its shipment#2  already.
It worked for me. It was getting stressful for a while there. Thank you for posting the links.
Worked for me also.  Only took me an hour and a half but finally made it through.
Thanks for the info, helped me get my ordered finished for NA!

used that link in like 8 different tabs, finally got through, 2nd attempt clicking place order

 Order Confirmation
Your order has been received. Thank you for your purchase!

Your order number is 110186040
Worked for me as well!

Was able to purchase via this work around.

Thank you.

OMG this worked for me THANK YOU. 

Or at least I was able to place an order hopefully I get it... fingers crossed

Got me to the checkout page and then stopped working :(

Edit: was finally able to get through. It was giving me a lot of issues when I was trying to sign in. Chose guest checkout and after waiting a good while I was finally able to finish it and received my email confirmation!
i got all the way to *click to complete purchase* then it spun to gateway timeout ><
Thanks for this got my order!
Try combining this with incognito mode on google chrome. That's what ultimately was able to get me the game!

Currently Placing Order after stressing and staring at it trying to load my address and stuff; now it's loading on the Placing Order bit but it looks like it's still working. Thanks so much! I almost missed class for this :D

Worked for me on NA!  Thanks for the tip!

{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
